snippet: Joe DeLamielluere, one the biggest critics of the settlement in a lawsuit that accused the N.F.L. of failing to warn players about concussions, joined the agreement, according to a court filing.
abstract: Joe DeLamielluere abandons long opposition to join NFL concussion settlement, reversing his role as one its biggest critics; joins nine others who initially opted out.
lead_paragraph: Joe DeLamielluere, one the biggest critics of the settlement in a lawsuit that accused the N.F.L. of failing to warn players about concussions, joined the agreement, according to a court filing.

headline.main: Critic of N.F.L. Settlement on Concussions Reverses Position
